content:
<rule id="3rd-party-30300" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <or>
                    <project>
                        <artifact artifactId="seata-spring-boot-starter" groupId="io.seata"/>
                    </project>
                    <project>
                        <artifact artifactId=">spring-cloud-starter-alibaba-seata" groupId="com.alibaba.cloud"/>
                    </project>                   
                </or>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <classification category-id="information" effort="0" title="Embedded framework - Cloud Seata">
                    <description>The application embeds the Cloud Seata framework.</description>
                </classification>
                <technology-tag level="INFORMATIONAL">Cloud Seata</technology-tag>
          </perform>
      </rule>
